rewrite1:

When you reach the ninth paragraph, change the Outline Level to 6, ensure there is no space before the paragraph begins, align the text to the right, and indent the first line by 1cm.

For the sixth paragraph, update the line spacing to Double, embolden the entire text, align it to the left, and reduce the font size to 48 points.

rewrite3:
Please update the formatting for the third paragraph by setting the Outline level to 'Body Text' and adjusting the line spacing to Multiple with a setting of 3 lines.

For the ninth paragraph, change the Outline level to Level 6. Ensure there is no space before the paragraph, align the text to the right, and set the indentation for the first line to 1cm.

In the sixth paragraph, alter the line spacing to Double, embolden the entire text, align it to the left, and reduce the font size to 48 points.
